title: Rise in Aftermarket Service to Aid Boeing (BA) in Q3 Earnings?
text: Boeing's (BA) Q3 results are likely to reflect solid revenue growth in its service business segment. Higher 737 deliveries and improved aftermarket service must have boosted cash flow

title: Final Trades: Oracle, Boeing & more
text: The "Halftime Report" traders give their top picks to watch for the second half.

title: Boeing wins support in push to extend MAX certification timetable
text: Boeing Co won support Wednesday from a Republican senator and a major customer in its bid to convince the U.S. Congress to extend the deadline to win certification of two new 737 MAX variants.

title: Boeing Q3 2022 Earnings Preview
text: Analysts expect $18 billion in revenues and a $0.08 loss per share. Our commercial aircraft modeling suggests 2% year-over-year growth in revenues for BCA.

title: Why Boeing Stock Is Moving Higher Today
text: The company is reportedly in talks to sell planes blocked by China to Air India.
